definition: to sting or bite (of mosquito, bee etc)/to say repeatedly/to urge insistently/to ask repeatedly/to stick to a point/(onom.) tinkling or jingling sound

sentences.english: When the white doves flew past, they struck the bells with their wings and made them tinkle.
sentences.chinese: 每當白鴿飛過，翅膀掠過鈴鐺，便叮鈴作響。

sentences.english: And when I say BELL 3, we are going to make love all night.
sentences.chinese: 第三個‘叮鈴’，我就會讓你舒服一整夜。
